Name: Landmarks, South Jamaica Gateway Rezoning, Queens (C 240328 ZMQ).
Title: Application number C 240328 ZMQ (South Jamaica Gateway Rezoning) submitted by Fulcrum Properties, LLC; The Briarwood Organization, LLC; and the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 14d, changing from an R4 District to an R7A District, changing from an R5B District to an R7A District, changing from an R5D District to an R7A District, and establishing within the proposed R7A District a C1-4 District, Borough of Queens, Community District 12, Council Districts 27 and 28.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions
